installCommand: bash -c 'cd /vercel/path0/myphoenixphone && npm install --include=dev && npm --workspace apps/backend exec prisma generate --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma'
buildCommand: bash -c 'cd /vercel/path0/myphoenixphone && npm run -w apps/backend build && npm run -w apps/web build && ln -s /vercel/path0/myphoenixphone/apps/web/.next /vercel/path0/.next'
